meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>rice</radical> <radical>ladle</radical> that's specifically for paying the rice <kanji>fee</kanji>. Each scoop of something has an extra fee tacked on, so when you use a <kanji>material</kanji>, there's a fee you have to pay in that material as well.
readingMnemonic: One day, the <kanji>fee</kanji> ladle is suddenly the size of <reading>row</reading> (りょう) boat oars! What! You're supposed to pay a row boat sized fee now?!
